title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Interlingual Learning Space: English-Korean Expert Collaborative Course

context.prior_knowledge: Language proficiency at B1 level or higher and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can engage in English discussions with native speakers on professional topics (medical/legal/technical) for over 15 minutes within 8 weeks
Learners can compare at least three differences in culture-specific communication strategies through Korean-English mutual translation by week 12
Learners can produce four or more practical simulation deliverables (reports/presentations) via task-oriented collaborative learning (Team-Based Learning)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
